etios.name: Toyota Etios
etios.description: The Toyota Etios is a classic sedan, perfect for both long strech trips and short travel.Ideal for solo travelers or small (2 or 3 member) families looking for a stylish and reliable option.

innova.name: Toyota Innova
innova.description: The Toyota Innova is a versatile multi-purpose vehicle that offers exceptional comfort and space. With its reliable performance, comfortable seating for up to 7 passengers, and ample cargo space, it's perfect for family trips or group travel.

innova crysta.name: Toyota Innova Crysta
innova crysta.description: If you're looking for a reliable, comfortable, and cost-effective MPV for your cab service, the Toyota Innova has long been a proven choice. With its spacious cabin, ergonomic seating, and smooth suspension, it ensures a comfortable ride for passengers on both short and long journeys.

swift.name: Maruti Swift Dzire
swift.description: The Suzuki Swift Dzire is a stylish and economical compact sedan, perfect for a city ride.Ideal for solo travelers or small (2 or 3 member) families looking for a reliable and cost-effective option.

ertiga.name: Maruti Suzuki Ertiga
ertiga.description: Looking for a smart, fuel-efficient, and comfortable MPV? The Maruti Suzuki Ertiga is the ideal choice.whether you're traveling within the city or on a long-distance journey, the Ertiga ensures a smooth and spacious ride for you and your companions.

traveller.name: Force Traveller
traveller.shortDescription: Spacious, reliable, powerful, comfortable, safe MPV
traveller.description: The Force Traveller is a spacious, reliable, and fuel-efficient multi-utility vehicle, perfect for travel, tourism, and business needs. With a powerful engine, comfortable seating, and advanced safety features, it ensures a smooth and hassle-free journey for passengers and operators alike.

bmw.name: BMW
bmw.shortDescription: Taxi offering luxuary,comfort, style, and elegance.
bmw.description: Experience luxury and comfort with our BMW, the perfect blend of style, performance, and elegance. This premium vehicle offers a smooth, quiet ride with a spacious, plush interior designed for ultimate relaxation.Ideal for business trips, airport transfers, or special occasions, the BMW sedan stands out with its sleek design and advanced features, ensuring both safety and convenience. Enjoy a first-class travel experience with professional drivers and top-tier service, making every journey as refined and comfortable as possible..
features: Smooth, quiet ride with advanced safety features
Professional chauffeur for a first-class experience

Audi.name: Audi
Audi.shortDescription: Luxury taxi offering comfort, elegance, and superior performance.
Audi.description: Experience refined luxury with our Audi, designed for those who appreciate comfort, elegance, and top-tier performance. With its sleek exterior, plush interior, and advanced safety features, this premium ride is perfect for business trips, airport transfers, or any special occasion. Enjoy a smooth, stylish journey with professional chauffeur service, ensuring a seamless travel experience every time.
features: Sophisticated, spacious interior with premium finishes
Smooth, powerful drive with advanced safety technology
Professional chauffeur ensuring a seamless travel experience
